Episodes.Title: Wine and Roses
Episodes.Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn
Episodes.Plot: Nacho runs for his life. Saul and Kim hatch a plan to mess with Howard. Mike questions his allegiances.

Episodes.Title: Carrot and Stick
Episodes.Writer: Vince Gilligan, Peter Gould, Thomas Schnauz
Episodes.Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn
Episodes.Plot: Kim and Saul enlist some familiar faces in their scheme to get Howard. Harsh realities dawn on Nacho. Gus investigates his suspicions.

Episodes.Title: Rock and Hard Place
Episodes.Writer: Vince Gilligan, Peter Gould, Gordon Smith
Episodes.Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn
Episodes.Plot: Still on the run, Nacho is forced to choose where his loyalties lie. Saul must decide whether he wants to remain a "friend of the cartel" after his reputation is called into question. Gus and Mike ready the team for a meet.

Episodes.Title: Hit and Run
Episodes.Writer: Vince Gilligan, Peter Gould, Ann Cherkis
Episodes.Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn
Episodes.Plot: Despite assurances from the cartel, Gus takes extreme measures to protect himself against looming threats. Kim and Saul enlist the help of a local pro to put on a show for Cliff Main. Howard seeks outside counsel.

Episodes.Title: Black and Blue
Episodes.Writer: Vince Gilligan, Peter Gould, Alison Tatlock
Episodes.Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn
Episodes.Plot: While business booms for Jimmy, the vise tightens on the cat-and-mouse game between Gus and Lalo.

Episodes.Title: Axe and Grind
Episodes.Writer: Vince Gilligan, Peter Gould, Ariel Levine
Episodes.Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn
Episodes.Plot: Kim and Jimmy enlist a knowledgeable contact; Howard scrutinizes Jimmy's business practices.

Episodes.Title: Plan and Execution
Episodes.Writer: Vince Gilligan, Peter Gould, Thomas Schnauz
Episodes.Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn
Episodes.Plot: Jimmy and Kim deal with a last-minute snag in their plan; Lalo is forced to make an unexpected move.

Episodes.Title: Point and Shoot
Episodes.Writer: Vince Gilligan, Peter Gould, Gordon Smith
Episodes.Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn
Episodes.Plot: An unexpected visitor forces Jimmy and Kim to face the consequences of their actions.

Episodes.Title: Fun and Games
Episodes.Writer: Vince Gilligan, Peter Gould, Ann Cherkis
Episodes.Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn
Episodes.Plot: Gus attempts to smooth things over with the cartel while Mike ties up loose ends as Jimmy and Kim deal with the repercussions of their actions.

Episodes.Title: Nippy
Episodes.Writer: Vince Gilligan, Peter Gould, Alison Tatlock
Episodes.Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Pat Healy, Jim O'Heir
Episodes.Plot: A lost dog leads to a new friend. A new player gets in the game.

Episodes.Title: Breaking Bad
Episodes.Writer: Vince Gilligan, Peter Gould, Thomas Schnauz
Episodes.Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Pat Healy
Episodes.Plot: The partners escalate their enterprise to new levels.

Episodes.Title: Waterworks
Episodes.Writer: Vince Gilligan, Peter Gould, Ariel Levine
Episodes.Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Rhea Seehorn, Pat Healy
Episodes.Plot: The stakes are raised when a discovery is made that will send shockwaves far and wide.

Episodes.Title: Saul Gone
Episodes.Writer: Vince Gilligan, Peter Gould, Ariel Levine
Episodes.Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn
Episodes.Plot: Revelations. Regrets. RICO violations. Jimmy's worlds - and identities - converge in one final showdown.
